Event.Message: Device Guard successfully processed the Group Policy: Virtualization Based Security = %1, Secure Boot = %2, DMA Protection = %3, Virtualization Based Code Integrity = %4, Credential Guard = %5, Reboot required = %6, Status = %7.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VirtualizationBasedSecurity" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SecureBoot" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DmaProtection" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HVCI" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LSA" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Reboot" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Device Guard failed to process the Group Policy to enable Virtualization Based Security (Status = %1): %2
